backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, templates, bio pages, influencers, and storage utilities with access control and helpers for generating IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to relevant files, components, and tests with high-level metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing routing, UI components, data hooks, and template-related behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes plus global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, auth/registration guards, and global app layout with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Responsive header with login/logout handling, navigation links, and optional Pro-only upload link.
frontend/src/components/LinksEditor.tsx: Renders a form to add, update, and remove link entries, managing their state via callbacks.
frontend/src/components/PaymentQrUploade: Handles uploading an image QR code with progress tracking and displays or removes the uploaded image.
frontend/src/components/SocialHandlesEdi: Provides UI to add, edit, and delete social media handle entries with platform selection.
frontend/src/components/TemplateCard.tsx: Displays a template preview card with thumbnail, details, and a button to navigate to the template page.
frontend/src/constants/categories.ts: Defines a constant list of influencer-related categories and its corresponding type.
frontend/src/data/seedTemplates.ts: Exports seed template data including metadata, thumbnails, and encoded editable content for initial population.
frontend/src/data/topInfluencers.ts: Contains a curated list of influencers with Instagram handles grouped by category.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, identity loading, and status handling using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as profiles, templates, subscriptions, and related operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and screenshot protection rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, and the Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements the subscription checkout UI with UPI payment details and triggers subscription activation after payment confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that promotes the service, handles Internet Identity login, and redirects logged‑in users with profiles to templates.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Displays subscription tiers, their features, and handles navigation to checkout with optional gating messages.
frontend/src/pages/SharedBioPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a shared bio page with title, bio text, social handles, and links, showing skeleton loaders and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Provides a profile signup form that submits user details and navigates to templates on success.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateDetailPage.ts: Shows detailed info for a selected template, blocks screenshot actions, and allows authenticated users to copy the template into the editor.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateEditorPage.ts: Allows editing a template’s content, saving it as a bio page, and generating a shareable URL.
frontend/src/pages/TemplateGalleryPage.t: Displays all templates with category filtering, loading skeletons, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTemplatePage.ts: Lets Pro users upload new templates with metadata and thumbnail handling, validating fields before upload.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s full state metadata, including version, high-level summary, and a list of implemented features with IDs and descriptions.
